stages.purpose: Understand the request, locate the relevant code files (HTML, CSS, or JavaScript controlling the textarea and its styling), analyze the existing styling rules, and determine the necessary modifications.
stages.expectedOutcome: Identification of the relevant files and understanding of the current styling constraints.
stages.transitionCriteria: Relevant files are identified and analyzed.

stages.purpose: Implement the changes to the CSS or styling rules to allow the textarea to expand and use more screen height. Ensure the change is responsive.
stages.expectedOutcome: Code modifications are made to achieve the desired styling.

stages.purpose: Test the changes in the thread view to ensure the textarea expands correctly and doesn't negatively impact other parts of the UI. Refine the styling as needed.
stages.expectedOutcome: The textarea styling behaves as expected across different screen sizes and the UI remains intact.
